alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:29PM EST until February 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. White River at Petersburg. .Minor river flooding is expected to develop on lower parts of the White River today and end late this week and weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding affects agricultural lands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Tuesday /8:30 PM CST Tuesday/ the stage was 15.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 16.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Wednesday afternoon by around 130 PM EST /1230 PM CST/.
